Desc.eng: Hold it right there, stranger. You can't pass. This is sacred land.
Did you find our ancient relic, hunter?
Not yet. These things take time.
We can't break the curse on that forsaken village.
Yes, I found your ancient relic.
Actually, I have quite a lot to do here. I came to deal with the curse that the Spiritwalkers brought down upon a village. I want you to break the curse.
I know that village well. A hive of murders and brigands who stole from our ancestors. The curse stays until we get our stolen relic back.
Don't worry. I'll hunt down your relic for you.
You know, I don't like your attitude. I'll break that curse on my own thenâ€¦ when I tear down your totem.
Then it's a good thing that I found your relic among the possessions of a monster.
Give it to me then, hunter, and we can lift the curse from that forsaken village.
This relic is far too valuable and I want to keep hold of it.
How dare you? We will take it from you by force.
